channel.title: Detection Lab on bubka hacks stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Detection Lab on bubka hacks stuff

item.title: Wazuh: SSH Brute Force
item.description: Simulated an SSH brute force attack using Hydra, observed Wazuh detection across 7 rule IDs, identified a gap in default alerting (max level 10), wrote a custom rule to escalate severity to level 12, and configured automated IP blocking via active response.
